title: Savile Row no Yuuwaku
description:
From SaltyPotatoesTrans:

Tell me how you show your sex appealㅡ
Shoemaker Jin has one problem, it’s that he can’t make shoes with ornate and glamorous design due to his serious and stubborn character.
Although when he asked his childhood friend Kei for his help, Kei suggested giving up his virginity in order to bring out Jin’s sex appeal.
But even before he loses his virginity, Kei held him andㅡ?!
A tailor made love story between two young artisans.
